Package client

Class Circle

java.lang.Object
java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D
java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D.Double
client.Circle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shape, Serializable, Cloneable
public class Circle extends Ellipse2D.Double
This is a circle which represents a field.

  • Constructor Details

    • Circle

      public Circle(double x, double y, double r)
      Constructs a new Circle object.
      Parameters:
      x - the X coordinate of the center of the circle.
      y - the Y coordinate of the center of the circle.
      r - the radius of the circle.

      public Color getColor()

    • isHit

      public boolean isHit(double x, double y)
      Checks whether a given point belongs to the circle.
      Parameters:
      x - the X coordinate of the given point.
      y - the Y coordinate of the given point.
      Returns:
      true, if the given point belongs to the circle, false otherwise.

    • changeStatus

      public void changeStatus()
      Changes status of the circle.

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2d)
      Draws the circle. If the circle is checked, it also draws a border.
      Parameters:
      g2d - Graphics2D object.
